      • passengerInit

        public void passengerInit(PassengerEnum state,
                          int bags,
                          java.lang.String situation,
                          int id)
        Initializes a passenger in the logging file. Changes it's state to the given one , sets it's amount of luggage and situation.
        Parameters:
        state - A state from enums.PassengerEnum .
        bags - The amount of bags the passenger owns.
        situation - The passenger's situation : either "FDT" (final destination) or "TRF" (in transit).
        id - The passenger's id. Ids range from 0 to global .

      • passCollectBag

        public void passCollectBag(int id)
        Removes a bag from the conveyor luggage and adds a bag to the passenger collected luggage.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the passenger to affect. Ids range from 0 to global-1 .

      • passComplain

        public void passComplain(int id)
        Sets the passenger to At the Baggage Reclaim Office (BRO) and adds a bag to the lost bag count.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the passenger to affect. Ids range from 0 to global-1 .

      • startNextFlight

        public void startNextFlight(int flightLuggage)
        Resets states to start the next flight. Does not write the log file on it's own. The update has to be written by another change. (The first passenger does so upon initialization)
